description:
I promise three things to you

1. You will Learn how to To get Shortlisted

2. You will Learn how to do Great in Job Interview

3. You will Learn how to Ask for Money (Salary Negotiations)

All in one Course. The complete Package to get you your DREAM JOB

The MOST RECENT Course on Udemy - Updated on 21st Feb 2015

Taught by the HR Recruiter and Trainer with over 7 Years of Experience with Resumes, Interviews and Accepting and Rejecting 100's of Candidates

________________________________________________________________

Struggling to understand why you are not getting that Interview Call? What is wrong with your Resume? Let us help you understand how to Make the Perfect Resume to get THAT Interview Call you have been waiting for. But That's not it!!. So You have landed an interview for a seemingly wonderful job!

NOW WHAT ?

Successful Interviewing will be essential in order for you to lock in an offer. Preparing for your job interview could very well be one of the Most Important Moments of Your Career.

This course will not only give you Tips, Tricks, and Strategies for Effective Resume Writing but also The Interview Skills that you NEED...from preparation through delivery. Proper preparation which help alleviate some of the stress involved in job interviews and the more you prepare, the more comfortable you will be interviewing. We will leann the tricks and trade of the Interview. As a bonus we will Also Learn HOW TO ASK for MONEY? Salary Negations which most people find most difficult aspect of the whole recruitment process. Do you want to get paid at least 20% Higher? The course will also teach you how you can prove your worth better to employer. What to ask and what to answer during the negotiation. And most importantly what are your cards and when to play them during the negotiation process.

We will cover the most important topics such as,

How to write a perfect resume to get the interview call?

What shouldn't you do when interviewing? The most common job interview mistakes, and blunders.

The types of questions to expect and how to answer it.

The interview Structure

The types of interviews and how to prepare for them?

The dos and dont before and during the interview

What can you ask during an interview.

How to find out your salary range?

What are the better answers in response to salary questions posed by the employer?

What to say and what not to say during the negotiation

Most Common Questions and Best Answers
title: Resume, Job Interview and Salary Negotiations - All in One
